data.name: Cloudy Haze Dream-Court
data.description: "Of cloud-haze faintly dreaming."\nA humble and unassuming bedroom alike in many ways to one you might find in Wangshu Inn. This bedroom's mystery is hard to explain in words. Sometimes it will evoke remembrance in those who pass through, like the sunlight poking through the swirling clouds. Yet it will remove the sorrows therein and leave only the marks of happenings past.\nWe are all adrift in this mortal life, and only by remembering who "we" are can we remain steady along our course. Our thoughts are clearest in the interstice between dreaming and waking. No wonder those who visit Wangshu Inn for a night find themselves re-energized a hundred times over, radiant and ready to embark on their journey once more.

text.text: After returning from a long journey, it would feel nice to rest here before heading out again.
Weapons can go there, and Sigils can go under my pillow. Mm-hmm.
But where should I put my parasol... I suppose I'll just put it by the door.
A big bed and soft pillow, appropriate lighting, and even a miniature tree for embellishment...
One can certainly rest well in a room like this.
I will try to finish all of my work before the sun comes up, and then... have a good sleep.
Getting a good rest is indeed key to being productive in one's work.
This bedroom has everything, except for one item: it needs a clock to gauge time with.
I'll find some time to accompany you to shop for a clock, lest you oversleep and miss something important.
There's an old saying in Liyue: "a bed that faces the door... shall be haunted by a ghost of horror."
But as long as I'm here, you won't have anything to worry about.
And if a couple of ghosts do come, you could invite them to play a game! Hmm... actually, why don't we put a table and some chairs in here? Hee-hee...
I didn't know you had such a knack for home d√©cor. This bedroom is quite suitable.
Speaking of the decorations, did you shop around to compare prices? And did you make sure that the artisan fees were at fair market rates?
Take me along next time you go shopping for furniture. I'll help you check all of that so you don't unexpectedly overpay for anything.
